Title: Relates to the New York state district attorney and indigent legal services attorney loan forgiveness program
Summary: Relates to the New York state district attorney and indigent legal services attorney loan forgiveness program; allows absence because of uniformed service, maternity/paternity, FMLA, or due to compensable injury to be creditable time.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the New York state district attorney and indigent legal services attorney loan forgiveness program
